June 17, 1876 D Moston Park Contest
Moston Park Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
moston-park-contest
None
Moston Park, Manchester 5 bands competed
Contest held during the "performance" of Mr Vaughan, the celebrated walker, who undertook to walk 50 miles in 10 hours. The course was 732 yards and he had to traverse it over 106 times. He completed it in 8 hours and 51 minutes - eclipsing Mr Weston's performances.
Nov. 11, 2012, 8 p.m. Nov. 11, 2012, 8:05 p.m.
